newsitem.title: USA: HBO to acquire Enterprise Systems.
newsitem.headline: HBO to acquire Enterprise Systems.

text.p: HBO & Co said Friday it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire Enterprise Systems Inc in a stock swap.
The stock-swap ratio will depend on the average closing price of HBO stock for 20 trading days before the transaction's close.
If the average price is between $60 and $68, ESI shareholders will receive HBO stock equal to $30 for each ESI share.
If the average price of HBO is below $60, ESI holders will receive 0.5 HBO share for each ESI share.
If the HBO average price is above $68 but below $72, ESI holders will get 0.4412 HBO share for each ESI share.
If the HBO average price is over $72, ESI holders will receive $31.77 worth of HBO stock for each ESI share.
Enterprise, which develops an integrated suite of resource management products for over 1,000 healthcare organizations in North America, had 1996 revenue of $52.3 million.
HBO delivers healthcare management software as well as networking technologies and outsourcing services to healthcare organizations.
HBO said it expects the deal to close during the second quarter.
